bio: Edwayne, a Breton man, studyies at the Bards College in Solitude. His only motivation for wanting to become a bard is to best a Nord man named Skjarn. Edwayne and Skjarn have been dueling (both verbally and physically) for quite some time, for reasons that are unclear and offenses that are both real and imagined. Edwayne is secretly a vampire, though he will not admit this to anyone.
name: Edwayne
